hero.title: Modern Docker
hero.description: A lightweight, powerful Docker management UI focused on simplicity and performance.

features.title: Lightweight Docker Management
features.description: Experience Docker management reimagined - ultra-lightweight and blazing fast. Built with Tauri and Rust, Dockerman uses minimal system resources while delivering instant response times. Streamlined interface with essential features for efficient container management.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Don't hesitate to get in touch with

items.question: Which operating systems does Dockerman support?
items.answer: Dockerman supports macOS, Windows, and major Linux distributions. Built with Tauri and Rust, it provides consistent performance and experience across various operating systems.

items.question: Does Dockerman require an internet connection?
items.answer: Dockerman is a local application that doesn't require an internet connection. It runs entirely on your device, ensuring your data security and privacy.

items.question: Where is SSH data stored?
items.answer: SSH data is stored on your device and is never uploaded to any server.

items.question: What makes Dockerman different from other Docker management tools?
items.answer: Dockerman stands out with its focus on speed and efficiency. It features fast startup times, minimal resource usage (<30MB memory), real-time container monitoring, and a clean, focused interface that prioritizes the most common Docker tasks.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Start managing your Docker containers with a lightweight, powerful desktop experience.

footer.description: A modern, lightweight Docker management UI. Built with love for developers around the world.
